name: Pigubes
description:
This game was created for Brackeys GameJam 2021.1 - Stronger Together #BrackeysGameJam

In Pigubes [pig-(c)ubes], you, a grey Space Pig, are defending your space station from horrible red Space Pigs to save your crewmates - the blue Space Pigs!

Controls: WASD, leftmouse, 1,2,3,... (alphanumerical)

Credits:

  • Developers
    • Petr Gondek - lead developer
    • Jan Bauer - developer and level designer
    • Martin Peka - AI and algorithms
  • Not team members but they helped us
    • Michael Kala - songwriter
    • Martin Švarc - shop menu icons
    • Vojtěch Hypša - Bfxr clicker
    • Šárka Weberová - character artist
